attributes.action: Equal Rights for Cancer Sufferers in Wales
attributes.additional_details:
The ITV News - report from "the rarer cancers foundation" cancer sufferers in Wales are 5 x less likely than those in England to recieve life extending treatment. Uk Government cancer drugs fund set up a 200million for those living in England but not Wales? Any concerns? Direct them to the Medical director NHS Wales - dr Chris jones.

OR SIGN THIS PETITION.
